data.title: Tracking COVID-19 in California
data.author: Michael Sullivan
data.excerpt: Update for {{_varStatDate_}} As of {{_varStatDateNoYear_}}, California has {{_varStatTotalCases_}} confirmed cases of COVID-19, resulting in {{_varStatTotalDeaths_}} deaths.
